Topic.Title: IFComp 2020: Vote on your favorites through Nov. 29

Posts.EditableText: The Interactive Fiction 2020 game archive just went online. You have until Nov. 29 to vote on your favorites! Click here to visit the archive My first Quest game, Tombs & Mummies, is an entrant. You can play it here. I programmed it in the Quest 5.8 desktop editor.
Posts.HTML:
The Interactive Fiction 2020 game archive just went online. You have until Nov. 29 to vote on your favorites!

Click here to visit the archive

My first Quest game, Tombs & Mummies, is an entrant. You can play it here. I programmed it in the Quest 5.8 desktop editor.

Posts.EditableText: Someone at intfiction.org posted this interesting breakdown of entrants based on development system: Twine 44 Glulx/Inform 24 Custom Web 9 Unity 5 Z-Code/Inform 4 Ink 4 TADS 3 Custom Windows 3 Quest 2 ADRIFT 2 Undum 1 Axma Story Maker 1 C64 BASIC 1 Z-Code/Dialog 1 TOTAL 104
